channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Buddhist monks and their dog captivate Americans while walking for peace
item.description: The monks say they want to promote mindfulness, healing and finding inner peace.

item.title: Shootout leaves South Carolina cop wounded, suspect killed
item.description: The sheriff described the shooting as an “ambush-style attack.”

item.title: Transgender teen athlete in a Supreme Court fight knows the upcoming sports season could be her last
item.description: Becky Pepper-Jackson is a 15-year-old in West Virginia who knows the upcoming sports season could be her last

item.title: Suspect arrested after fire damages historic Mississippi synagogue
item.description: A fire heavily damaged a historic synagogue in Mississippi.

item.title: Milan’s Catholic archdiocese brings Olympic values into parish life
item.description: As Milan prepares to host the 2026 Winter Olympics, the city’s Catholic archdiocese launched a multi-year program that uses sport to promote values su...
